about:
I am Chirag Surendra, a Software Developer currently working as a Full Stack Developer at MSG Global Solutions. Passionate about building efficient and scalable solutions, I thrive on solving complex problems and continuously refining my technical expertise.

At MSG Global Solutions, I focus on developing and optimizing web applications, leveraging Angular for frontend development and Java with Spring Boot for backend services. Previously, during my internship at A.P. Moller Maersk, I enhanced shipment service APIs' performance and reliability while gaining hands-on experience with SpringBoot, Angular, and monitoring tools like Grafana and Prometheus.

Beyond work, I enjoy playing cricket, listening to insightful podcasts, and spending time on my family farm. I aim to deepen my expertise in cloud computing and distributed systems, working on impactful projects that drive innovation and efficiency.
